site_name: 12 ST GERMANS PLACE, BLACKHEATH, LONDON, SE3 0NN
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
20/1071/F - Reconfiguration of 2 existing residential properties (being a 2-bed apartment with 6-bed maisonette over) into 1 x 2-bed and 1 x 3-bed dwellings with lower ground floor rear extensions, new front and rear boundary walls, and internal and external modifications. (Re-consultation - revised drawings and amended description).

20/1072/L - Reconfiguration of 2 existing residential properties (being a 2-bed apartment with 6-bed maisonette over) into 1 x 2-bed and 1 x 3-bed dwellings with lower ground floor rear extensions, new front and rear boundary walls and internal and external modifications including: All original windows, doors and shutters to be made good and repainted; Removal of all on-original window shutters on rear elevation; Rear ground floor doors to be removed and replaced; Garage door to be removed and replaced with timber glazed door and sidelight; Removal of lower ground floor sliding sash window and lowering of cill to create new opening; Removal of lower ground floor slatted gate and wall to create new opening; Demolition of internal walls and construction of new staircase; All fireplaces to be exposed were concealed and made good; Internal timber staircases, ceilings, walls, door leafs and architrave detailing to be made good; andNew skirting with profile and materials to match existing.
description: Variation of approved application for Listed Building Consent dated 15 January 2021 (Reference:20/1072/L); The proposal mainly includes minor modification of the approval internal arrangements without impacting the historic layout.
